response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and engineered to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and quality that can significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its value exceeds $800,000. I kindly invite you to consider this exceptional opportunity. If you're interested in learning more about how this product can benefit you, please let me know, and we can schedule a detailed discussion. We look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 800000}
